title: News24.com | Coronavirus: First SA deaths 'should be a wake-up call to all of us' - EFF
description: The EFF has called on South Africans to take the novel coronavirus (Covid-19) outbreak seriously and has urged people to follow regulations put in place for the 21-day lockdown in the country, which started at midnight.
content:
The EFF has called on South Africans to take the novel coronavirus (Covid-19) outbreak seriously and has urged people to follow regulations put in place for the 21-day lockdown in the country, which started at midnight.
The party sent its condolences to the … [+1889 chars]
